rolled in today we're in Paris and yes
that is the Eiffel Tower poking up over

at the thule a gardens and we're walking

is answer some of the questions from

know that's not a lot of people speak
English you know very well and stuff
like that but there are a few that speak
English and a lot of you asked mark how
do I get a job teaching English abroad
because I hear a lot of people say oh
one of the good things about you know
being able to travel the world like I
just go teach English in Korea or
someplace else the facts are it's not as
easy as you think to get teaching jobs
abroad but there are some things you can
do one thing I highly recommend is make
sure you get a people certificate a
teach English as a foreign language
certificate because a lot of places will
require that to get the job to actually
teach in some of these schools also if
you're looking to get a visa in order to
go to those countries they might require
some kind of education proving that you
can teach English because just because
you can speak English it doesn't mean
you can teach it very well okay so make
sure you can get these things either
online sometimes you get to your
community college and things like that
but make sure you get that people
certificate yes it will take you some
time and you do have to pay for it but
it does help open up more doors in terms
of teaching English as a foreign
language
having that certificate because if you
want to work at a Wall Street interest
Institute or a British Institute or
these kind of things or the British
Council sorry these kind of places you
will need to have some kind of
certificate to prove that you are able
to teach and have some experience now
having said that you're not necessarily
have to have it there are places that
will be glad just to have native
speakers to do that smaller schools
you'll see that more often also that you
get into teaching private lessons you
teach part of lessons you can actually
make a lot more money and if you have
some background like I have a business
background so I could teach your
business English that can make me more
money if I'm going to teach some
executives and things like that versus
if I taught a class of ten people just
learning basic English so those are some
advice for you on there also if you're
coming from the US or Canada and
thinking well I'll just come to Europe
and teach English here well the thing
they I've met English teachers from
Poland
I met English teachers from Lithuania
I've met English teachers from Britain
that are here in Europe and remember in
Europe they had to hire Europeans first
so there's a European that could teach
that class they might get the job before
you so you want to be careful with that
okay so I hope that helped you know a
little bit more about getting your
teaching certificate get those things
before you come to make it a little bit
easier to find a job there's no
guarantee but it does help
